scripts.build: react-scripts build && echo 'pennapps.com' > build/CNAME && git add build/CNAME && git add src public build && git commit -am 'Building site for gh-pages' && git checkout -B gh-pages && git add -f build && git commit -am 'Rebuild' && git filter-branch -f --prune-empty --subdirectory-filter build && git push -f origin gh-pages && git checkout - && git push origin master
